resources.string:
In order to monitor clipboard you need to enable the accessibility service from settings.

1. Click OK to open accessibility settings.
2. Click on Installed Services (Samsung).
3. Search for XClipper.
4. Click and enable it.
This will stop the clipboard monitoring functionality.

This will let XClipper to monitor clipboard & will able to capture some of known strategies if system detects any copy/cut action.


This feature is still in BETA for Android 10+ users and may not work always.
